title: What is Arctic Ops?
body: I have realized that 3 champions, Varus, Kennen, and Caitlyn have this skin. What is the theme?

replies.body: It's a cold weather military theme.  Like if the marines got sent on a secret mission to the Siberian tundra or something like that.

Waaait..
Does that mean that we should have Arctic Ops Quinn instead of a Woad Quinn?
The theme is "Texans visiting Canada in August."
Nah, Quinn's snow gear is still very earthy and tribal in nature.  Woad is forest-and-nature-inspired.  Arctic Ops is specifically military.  Ops is short for Operations.
No, only Varus and Kennen have Arctic Ops. Caitlyn's is Arctic Warefare.
